channel.title: CVE Feed for Sophos -- Sophos Mobile managed on-premises
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Sophos -- Sophos Mobile managed on-premises

item.title: CVE-2022-3980|2024-08-03T01:27:54.013Z -- sophos -- sophos%20mobile%20managed%20on-premises
item.description: An XML External Entity (XEE) vulnerability allows server-side request forgery (SSRF) and potential code execution in Sophos Mobile managed on-premises between versions 5.0.0 and 9.7.4.
